author: munishpalmakhija
body: ## Steps to reproduce ## Expected behavior ``` Connect-Vmc -ApiToken $APIToken should connect and return the authorization token It works with Powershell 7.0.0 but doesn't work in 7.0.2 ``` ## Actual behavior ``` We use Connect-Vmc module which uses Invoke-RestMethod which is failing PS /root> Connect-Vmc -ApiToken $APIToken Connect-Vmc: 6/18/2020 11:04:48 PM Connect-Vmc Unable to create security context. Details: The SSL connection could not be established, see inner exception. When I manually use Invoke-RestMethod with console.cloud.vmware.com I also see The remote certificate is invalid according to the validation procedure. It only works when I do -SkipCertificateCheck ``` ## Environment data ``` PS /root> $PSVersionTable Name Value ---- ----- PSVersion 7.0.2 PSEdition Core GitCommitId 7.0.2 OS Linux 3.10.0-229.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Fri Mar 6 11:36:42 UTC 2015 Platform Unix PSCompatibleVersions {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…} PSRemotingProtocolVersion 2.3 SerializationVersion 1.1.0.1 WSManStackVersion 3.0 ```
